headline: Is Texas Pacific Land Corporation (TPL) an Extraordinarily Unique and Profitable Business?
summary: Wedgewood Partners, an investment management company, released its fourth-quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In the fourth quarter, Wedgewood Composite’s net return was 5.5% compared to the Standard & Poor’s 2.4%, the Russell 1000 Growth Index’s 7.1%, and the Russell 1000 Value Index’s -2.0% return for the same […]
